mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memnum, id, pass, name, birth, gender, email, joindate, state, auth) VALUES (seq_member_memnum.nextval,#{id},#{pass},#{name},#{birth},#{gender},#{email},sysdate,'일반회원',0)
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, pass = #{pass}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE member SET outdate = sysdate, state = '탈퇴' WHERE id = #{id}
